q_4_3.question_text: Describe the proposed sewer connection method and location
q_4_3.answer: Wye fitting into existing 4" ABS lateral, approximately 15' north of main house cleanout near back porch. New two-way cleanout at connection point. 4" ABS from ADU to connection, 2% slope.

q_4_4.question_text: Where is the proposed water supply point of connection?
q_4_4.answer: New 3/4" copper line tee off existing 3/4" supply at north side hose bib, running 35' along side yard to ADU. Isolation valve at tee and at ADU entry.

q_11_3.question_text: Where does surface water currently drain on the property?
q_11_3.answer: Property slopes gently southwest toward the alley. Existing swale along south property line carries runoff to street. No standing water issues observed.
